diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Sustainable Development.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    SustainableDevelopment[Sustainable Development] --> Field1[Social Sciences]
    SustainableDevelopment --> Field2[Environmental]
    SustainableDevelopment --> Integration[Integration Areas]
    socialsciences --> socialsciencesSub1[Theory]
    socialsciences --> socialsciencesSub2[Practice]
    environmental --> environmentalSub1[Theory]
    environmental --> environmentalSub2[Practice]
    Integration --> Methods[Research Methods]
    Integration --> Applications[Applications]
